content: this pattern is for kids and adults you can use any yarn any size and any size circular needles including tunisian crochet and knooking you can also use a circular knitting loom manual crank or electric i made mine using the jamit knitting loom the pattern is simple create a tube of knitted fabric to the desired length you can take a sewing tape measure and loop it around the neck of the child or adult who will be wearing it to gauge the length when the tube is knitted or crocheted to the desired length you re done now the magic happens there are so many ways to wear it i made them for my grandkids in 2024 for christmas they were 5 7 & 9 it was a hit modeled in pics by the 5 year old you ll see where she got tired of posing lol to make tassels or a pompom as shown in pics i just tied an elastic hair band around the end enjoy
